summary: Comprehensive testing of Phase 4 features for KitLog Football Jersey Cataloging App. All 5 requested improvements verified: (1) Correction reports show field-by-field comparison table, (2) Pending submissions expand to show detailed form, (3) '+ Add Jersey' removed from navbar and added to Contributions page, (4) Collection items have 'printing' field for player names, (5) MyCollection edit opens Sheet panel with full details.
passed_tests: Navbar: '+ Add Jersey' button removed from desktop nav links
Navbar: '+ Add Jersey' button removed from dropdown menu
Navbar: Contains Browse, My Collection, Contributions (for logged-in users)
Contributions page: '+ Add Jersey' button present
Contributions page: Multi-step form (Step 1: Master Kit, Step 2: Version) working
Contributions page: 'Use Existing Kit' option available in Step 1
Contributions page: Form fields - club, season, type, brand, year, photo all present
Contributions page: Add Jersey form calls POST /api/submissions (not direct kit creation)
Contributions page: Pending submissions are expandable (click to expand/collapse)
Contributions page: Submission detail shows all fields - club, season, type, brand, competition, model, gender, SKU
Contributions page: Version submissions show parent kit info
Contributions page: Correction reports expandable
Contributions page: Reports show field-by-field comparison (Field | Current | Proposed columns)
Contributions page: Changed fields highlighted in comparison table
Contributions page: Photo comparison supported in reports
MyCollection page: Edit icon (pen) opens Sheet panel
MyCollection page: Sheet panel has 'Printing / Player' field
MyCollection page: Sheet panel has condition, size, value_estimate, notes, category fields
MyCollection page: Sheet panel shows Jersey Hierarchy summary (Master -> Version -> Item)
MyCollection page: Save button updates item and closes sheet
MyCollection page: Grid view shows printing info when set
MyCollection page: List view shows printing info when set
Backend: POST /api/collections accepts 'printing' field
Backend: PUT /api/collections/{id} accepts 'printing' field
Backend: GET /api/collections returns items with 'printing' field
Backend: POST /api/submissions creates master_kit submissions
Backend: POST /api/submissions creates version submissions
Backend: GET /api/submissions returns submissions with all fields
Backend: GET /api/reports returns original_data for field comparison
seed_data_creation: Created test user with session token for authenticated testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 4 features are fully implemented and working. The app now has: (1) Field-by-field comparison for correction reports instead of JSON, (2) Expandable submissions with detailed views, (3) '+ Add Jersey' moved from navbar to Contributions page with multi-step form, (4) 'printing' field for player names in collection items, (5) Sheet panel for editing collection items with hierarchy summary. Test user: test-user-1771361784079, session: test_session_1771361784079
